ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: when the Heaven is peeled away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The curtain drawn back from the skies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and when Heaven is laid bare;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when the heaven is torn away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when the heaven is Kushitat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when the heaven has its covering removed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when heaven shall be stripped off;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the sky is torn away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the heaven shall be stripped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: when the sky is stripped off,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When the world on High is unveiled;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the heaven shall be stripped off and taken away from its place;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When the sky is peeled away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when the sky is stripped away
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:11] and when the heaven is stripped off, torn away from its place, just as the skin of a sheep is stripped off;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the sky is torn away,
